name: Monitoring-app
description: An app for viewing monitoring data

scripts.open: npm run build:dev && npm run dev | opnr | garnish
scripts.start: npm run build:dev && npm run dev | garnish
scripts.build:dev: copyfiles index.html dist && npm run build:css && npm run build:img
scripts.build:web: npm run build:dev && npm run build:js
scripts.build:css: postcss --use postcss-import --use autoprefixer --use postcss-url --postcss-url.url inline css/index.css > dist/bundle.css
scripts.build:js: browserify js/index.js -t [ jstify --engine lodash ] | uglifyjs -mc > dist/bundle.js
scripts.predeploy: npm run build:web && copyfiles CNAME dist
scripts.build:chrome: copyup chrome/* dist && crx pack dist -o dist/mapfilter.crx
